channel.title: Glam Metal on My Vinyl Records Collection
channel.description: Recent content in Glam Metal on My Vinyl Records Collection

item.title: Love at First Sting
item.description: Actually, I have double entries of this album. The first one I’ve found was damaged and some tracks were unplayable. I’ve found later a second one to replace it. However, the first one I’ve bought was actually a gift to the original owner. There is a message hand-written on the cover. The kind of nice thing you can discover while buying used vinyl records.

item.title: The Crimson Idol
item.description: This is a 2012 German reissue of my favorite album of this band. The disc is transparent red. The Crimson Idol is an Opera Rock which is for me the best piece of Heavy Metal I’ve ever heard.

item.title: W.A.S.P.
item.description: This picture album is a German limited edition reissue of the 1984 debut studio album of the american heavy metal band W.A.S.P.
